Package sg.dex.starfish

Class Ocean

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.dex.starfish.Ocean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resolver
    public class Ocean
extends Object
implements Resolver
    Main entry point for Ocean ecosystem capabilities.

    An instance of the Ocean class is used to represent a connection to the Ocean network and supports functionality related to accessing the on-chain state of the Ocean network.

    Author:
    Mike

      • installLocalDDO

        public void installLocalDDO​(DID did,
                            String ddoString)
        Registers a DID with a DDO in the context of this Ocean connection on the local machine.

        This registration is intended for testing purposes.

        Parameters:
        did - A did to register
        ddoString - A string containing a valid DDO in JSON Format
